verbs.description: [ARG0: russian spacewalk] to [V: investigate] [ARG1: air leak - causing hole in space station] rescheduled for december russian officials say a spacewalk to inspect a hole that caused air leak in the international space station will now take place in december the spacewalk was delayed following last week aborted launch of the soyuz which required an emergency rescue of a nasa astronaut and a russian cosmonaut hubble space telescope space station houston chronicle sergei krikalyov united states kazakhstan alex stuckey alexander gerst nick hague international space station hague european space agency alexey ovchinin russia nasa
